testcase.description:
use scenario 3 to test |--------Primary Tunnel-----VPN Client 1-----laptop VPN Server |--------Primary Tunnel-----VPN Client 2-----laptop
1. GRE-over-IPsec encapsulation of station traffic on the source remote-office AP 2. GRE-over-IPsec decapsulation of station traffic at the central office VPN server 3. Forwarding of the station traffic at the central office VPN server to backhaul to different subnet 4. GRE-over-IPsec encapsulation of forwarded traffic at the central office VPN server 5. GER-over-IPsec decapsulation of forwarded traffic received at the destination remote-office AP 6. Verify the upper step by Unicast/Broadcast pkt. 7. Verify the upper step when packet is fragmentation.

step.desc: move ap1 to vlan ${tb.vlan2}
step.console: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client"

step.desc: recheck mgt0 ip
refresh ap1.mgt0.ip
setup ap1 as VPN server
step.telnet: -v "save vpn ee-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:${pub.cert.vpn.tftp}/server_cert.pem no-prompt" -v "save vpn private-key tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:${pub.cert.vpn.tftp}/server_key.pem no-prompt" -v "vpn xauth-client-list clientList local" -v "vpn xauth-client-list clientList client-name vpnclient1 password aerohive" -v "vpn xauth-client-list clientList client-name vpnclient2 password aerohive" -v "vpn client-ip-pool ipPool local ${tb.vlan3.dhcp_start} ${tb.vlan3.dhcp_end} netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "vpn server-ipsec-tunnel primaryServer" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel primaryServer client-list clientList client-ip-pool ipPool dns-server ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy server ipsec-tunnel primaryServer" -v "user-profile Tunnel${tb.vlan3} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan3} attribute ${tb.vlan3}"

step.desc: setup ssid on VPN server
step.telnet: -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-server" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-server default-user-profile-attr ${tb.vlan3}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-server security protocol-suite open" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-server" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-server security-object ${ssid.name}-server" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-server" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}-server"

step.desc: change mgt0 vlan of AP2
setup ap2 as VPN client1
step.telnet: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "save vpn ca-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:${pub.cert.vpn.tftp}/cacert.pem no-prompt" -v "vpn client-ipsec-tunnel vpn_server_1" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel vpn_server_1 gateway ${ap1.mgt0.ip} client-name vpnclient1 password aerohive" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy client ipsec-tunnel vpn_server_1 primary"

step.desc: setup ssid on VPN client1
step.telnet: -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-client" -v "user-profile Tunnel${tb.vlan3} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan3} attribute ${tb.vlan3}" -v "user-profile Tunnel${tb.vlan3} tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-client default-user-profile-attr ${tb.vlan3}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-client security protocol-suite open" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-client" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-client security-object ${ssid.name}-client" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-client" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}-client"

step.desc: change mgt0 vlan of AP3
setup ap3 as VPN client2
step.telnet: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "save vpn ca-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:${pub.cert.vpn.tftp}/cacert.pem no-prompt" -v "vpn client-ipsec-tunnel vpn_server_1" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel vpn_server_1 gateway ${ap1.mgt0.ip} client-name vpnclient2 password aerohive" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy client ipsec-tunnel vpn_server_1 primary"

step.desc: setup ssid on VPN client2
step.telnet: -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-client" -v "user-profile Tunnel${tb.vlan3} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan3} attribute ${tb.vlan3}" -v "user-profile Tunnel${tb.vlan3} tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-client default-user-profile-attr ${tb.vlan3}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}-client security protocol-suite open" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-client" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-client security-object ${ssid.name}-client" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-client" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-client shutdown" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}-client" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}-client shutdown"

step.desc: check vpn ike sa on vpn client1 side
check vpn ike sa on vpn client2 side
check vpn ike sa on vpn server side
show config on vpn server
step.telnet: -v "show vpn tunnel-id" -v "show vpn ike sp" -v "show vpn ipsec-tunnel"

step.desc: show config on vpn client1
step.telnet: -v "show vpn tunnel-id" -v "show vpn ike sp" -v "show vpn ipsec-tunnel"

step.desc: show config on vpn client2
step.telnet: -v "show vpn tunnel-id" -v "show vpn ike sp" -v "show vpn ipsec-tunnel"

step.desc: show interface tunnel0 on vpn client1
get ip of tunnel0 on vpn client1
show interface tunnel0 on vpn client2
get ip of tunnel0 on vpn client
check show station on ssid ${ssid.name}-client
check route of sta1 on vpn client
enable debug on VPN server
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${sta1.tif.ip} protocol 1 bidirectional" -v "_ff id 2 protocol 47 bidirectional" -v "_ff id 3 protocol 50 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"

step.desc: check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap2.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) eth0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${tb.vlan1.gw}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.vlan1.gw}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap2.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap2.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) eth0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${tb.vlan3.gw}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.vlan3.gw}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap2.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap2.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) eth0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${tb.vlan3.gw}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.vlan3.gw}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap2.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check show station on vpn server
enable debug on AP1
check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap2.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) wifi.* ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) wifi.* ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap2.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap2.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check "show amrp tunnel route" on vpn client1
shutdown ssid ${ssid.name}-client on vpn client1
step.telnet: -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-client shutdown" -v "interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}-client shutdown"

step.desc: bring up ssid ${ssid.name}-client on vpn client2
step.telnet: -v "no interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-client shutdown" -v "no interface wifi1 ssid ${ssid.name}-client shutdown"

step.desc: check show station on vpn client2
check "show amrp tunnel route" on vpn client2
check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap3.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) eth0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${tb.vlan1.gw}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.vlan1.gw}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap3.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap3.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) eth0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${tb.vlan3.gw}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.vlan3.gw}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap3.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap3.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) eth0 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${tb.vlan3.gw}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.vlan3.gw}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap3.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: check ping pkt go through tunnel success
step.log-match: -b "\(o\) eth0 ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(50\)" -ps p "\(i\) mgt0 ${ap3.tunnel0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" p "\(o\) wifi.* ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-req" p "\(i\) wifi.* ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}.*?icmp-echo-reply" p "encap outgoing packet ${ap1.mgt0.ip}->${ap3.tunnel0.ip}.*?proto\(47\)" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${ap3.mgt0.ip}->${ap1.mgt0.ip}.*?proto\(50\)" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
